venue.name: Any Public Library or City Hall

item.description:
Change of plans. Any activism this weekend should be helping Maine if you can. I just hit up the Library for some Voter Registration Forms. This Sat (and today) hit your library up for forms. Don't take all of theirs, but grab a significant amount. We will go canvas next Saturday.

In the mean time try to register as many friends Republican for the Primary.
item.name: Retrieve Voter Registration Forms
